title: (x) Phamous 69 magazine - Fortuna Dot (Futura Dot) {Mike F}
content:
What font is this main one (dotted one) on this site: [http://www.phamous69.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100409011918/http:/www.phamous69.com/ "http://www.phamous69.com/")

thanx in advance :)
author: Bond1806

comments.content: It's Futura Extra Bold, but I'm not sure if the dots are a font or an effect added in post.
Yeah, I was pretty sure about Futura, but cant figure out if I have seen similar font with dost or not. Its kinda blury in my mind...

I half-expected this to be in the Dover Pattern Alphabets book (most of the fonts in it are just Futura Extra Bold with different effects applied).

Ray Larabie's [Budmo](http://web.archive.org/web/20100409011918/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/budmo/) is a nice alternative with only one line of dots. It's free, so it's worth a try.

- Lex

See [Harold Lohner's](http://web.archive.org/web/20100409011918/http:/www.haroldsfonts.com/frontpage.html) version of Futura Dot - which he calls [Fortuna Dot](http://web.archive.org/web/20100409011918/http:/www.haroldsfonts.com/fortdot.html).
Mike, that's the exact font on the site, good id.
